goal.en: The objective of this course is to build the concepts in sufficient depth so that students can understand the principles of motor control methods, including dc machines, induction machines and synchronous machines. Furthermore, students can learn how to use the power device to proceed energy conversion and control the electric machines.
goal.ch: 建立學生對電機控制與電力電子的基本概念，學習直流機、感應機與同步機之參數量測與控制原理，並瞭解如何利用功率半導體元件進行電能轉換與應用。

content.en:
In this course, some control projects are introduced. Those projects including power electronics, energy conversion and motors will be demonstrated to let the students understand the control theories.
There are four parts in the experiments.
1.DC Motor Control
2.DC Generator Control
3.AC Motor Control
4.AC Generator Control
content.ch:
課程內容主要介紹電機控制的基本原理並進行實驗，包括電力電子、電能轉換器、電動機與發電機等裝置，並瞭解如何利用電力電子技術完成電機控制的目的。授課內容主要分成四個部分
1.直流電動機控制
2.直流發電機控制
3.交流電動機控制
4.交流發電機控制
